detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have over 50 years of experience and have won over $1 billion in compensation for clients.

detailsData.title: Record-Setting Results
detailsData.content: We have obtained record-setting results in multiple states, including California, Hawaii, and more.

detailsData.title: Top Legal Recognition
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are consistently named to Super Lawyers®, The Best Lawyers in America, and other prestigious legal lists.

address: 500 Ala Moana Blvd, Suite 400, Honolulu, HI 96813
valueProp: Bostwick & Peterson, LLP is one of Hawaii's premier personal injury law firms, dedicated to fighting for victims and families.
